story.text: SAN FRANCISCO Jan 3 Synopsys Inc. (SNPS.O) said on Wednesday that a U.S. court had ordered Magma Design Automation Inc. LAVA.O to transfer to Synopsys title of two patents at issue in a legal dispute between the two makers of microchip design software. Synopsys said the U.S. District Court for Northern California, addressing the company's December motion for a preliminary injunction against Magma, had ordered Magma to immediately withdraw ownership claims to two patents for fixed timing inventions.
story.title: synopsys says court orders patent title transfer
